list.name: To-Do list
list.item: The possibility to receive an email when you have been attacked, a dragon has been set or the kingdom is at war.
2nd Message of the Day! Lets get on Todoing stuff!
The masterpage main.master needs to be remade. Need support to allow the pages to add scripts and stylesheet.

http://sharethis.com/

Add this to the top right of the master pages

item.subject: UI design ideas, suggestions and more

list.item:
I asked my kd (they have no idea that i program here aswell) what they thought about pimp and what they thought of the functionallity etc. Ill update this with the reflections that they provide:


- I set angel to auto export intel what i copy making it easy to use. Still need to manually copy ops into pimp though. Also pimp isnt as good as it use to be. There are a lot of errors and such.

- I had difficulty last age with getting my ops in. It never showed that i put greed on someone. Also the minus in front of the away army can be overlooked thus failing an attack because his armies are home. For the rest i like how it works and got a lot of second attacks in because of accurate intel. Which when i would have gotten it myself would not have been possible due to oversending because of inaccuracy.

list.name: Goals
list.item: Brainstorming regarding pimp and the future.
